storyThreads.title: The Awakening
storyThreads.summary: Something sealed away long ago stirs in Blazedump.

beats.summary: Blazedump stirs to life
Animals flee the area.
Old artifacts reactivate.
Time seems to distort near the site. Haraldus remains seeks knowledge and wisdom.
Local wildlife behaves erratically. Darkness spreads its influence.

potentialOutcomes: The evil is resealed, but weakened watchers remain.
The evil is destroyed at tremendous cost.
The evil proves to be misunderstood—not evil at all.
The evil escapes and begins its conquest.
A bargain is struck with the awakened power.

storyThreads.title: The Awakening

beats.summary: Wellston stirs to life
Dreams of darkness plague the populace.
Time seems to distort near the site. Eluned remains motivated by fear and survival.
Heroes are drawn to confront it. Hope flickers in the darkness.

beats.summary: A new threat arises: Gundesvinda the Grinning
Supplies dwindle; the hunt becomes desperate.
A bounty is placed, attracting more Gundesvinda the Grinning.
The quarry leaves a taunt. It's personal now.
The hunt leads through treacherous terrain.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alive—but for what purpose?

beats.summary: Guiltycrack spirits high
A new tale begins: "The Guiltycrack Haunting"
The haunting ends.
Investigations begin. Amellia remains driven by ambition and status.

potentialOutcomes: The spirits are laid to rest.
The haunting intensifies to lethal levels.

The "haunting" proves to have mortal origins.
